{{ardayearheader|2938|2939|2940|2941|2942|2943|2944}}
==[[March]]==
*'''[[15 March|15]]''': [[Gandalf]] meets [[Thorin]] near [[Bree]] and eventually decide about the [[Quest of Erebor]].<ref>{{App|Durin}}, footnote after "On a time", p. 1077</ref>
==[[April]]==
*'''[[6 April|6]]''': [[Bilbo Baggins]] is out for ''[[Yestare]]''; [[Gandalf]] visits [[Bag End]], talks with [[Holman Greenhand]] and realises Bilbo is the right person for the Quest.<ref>{{UT|Erebor}}</ref>
* [[Thorin]] and [[Gandalf]] visit [[Bilbo Baggins|Bilbo]] in [[the Shire]].<ref name="TA">{{App|TA}}</ref><ref>{{H|1}}</ref>
* The next day [[Thorin and Company]] depart for the ''[[Green Dragon]]''. Bilbo catches up at 11 a.m. Quest for Erebor begins.<ref>{{H|2}}</ref>
==Spring-Summer==
* Bilbo meets [[Gollum]] and finds [[the One Ring]].<ref name="TA"/>
* The [[White Council]] meets.<ref name="TA"/>
* [[Saruman]] agrees to an [[Attack on Dol Guldur]], since he now wishes to prevent [[Sauron]] from searching the [[Anduin]].<ref name="TA"/>
* [[Sauron]] having made his plans abandons [[Dol Guldur]].<ref name="TA"/>
==[[September]]==
*Bilbo and [[Thorin and Company]] escape the [[Elvenking's Halls]] on barrels.
*'''[[22 September|22]]''': Bilbo's birthday; that day he arrives in [[Lake-town]].
==Later==
* [[Bard]] of [[Lake-town|Esgaroth]] slays [[Smaug]].<ref name="TA"/> 
* The [[Battle of Five Armies]] in [[Dale]].<ref name="TA"/>
* Death of [[Thorin]] Oakenshield, [[Fíli]], and [[Kíli]].<ref name="TA"/>
* Death of [[Bolg]].<ref>{{H|Return}}</ref>
* [[Dáin Ironfoot|Dáin II Ironfoot]] of the [[Iron Hills]] becomes [[King under the Mountain]].<ref name="TA"/>
==Unknown==
* Birth of [[Tolman Cotton Senior|Tolman Cotton]], first child and son of [[Holman Cotton]].<ref>{{App|Gamgee}}</ref>
* Death of [[Hildigrim Took]].<ref>{{App|Took}}</ref>
==See also==
